member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT
member.summary: Defines the output of the Interaction Context object.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.interactionId
member.summary: ID of the Interaction Context object.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.interactionFlags
member.summary: One of the constants from INTERACTION_FLAGS.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.x
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the input pointer, in HIMETRIC units.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.y
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the input pointer, in HIMETRIC units.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.arguments.tap
member.summary: The state of the tap gesture.

member.name: INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT.arguments.crossSlide
member.summary: The state of the cross-slide interaction.
